if.cond: mod_loaded('EFTX_Pack_Slow_Progress') or mod_loaded('EFTX_Pack_Standard') and not mod_loaded('not_zz_REBIRTH__Core')

append.xpath: /entity_classes/entity_class[(contains(@name, 'zombieSteve') or contains(@name, 'zombieTomClark') or contains(@name, 'zombieBoe') or contains(@name, 'zombieJanitor') or contains(@name, 'zombieInmate') or contains(@name, 'zombieYo') or contains(@name, 'zombieDemolition') or contains(@name, 'zombieWight') or contains(@name, 'zombieSkate') and not (contains(@name, 'zombieSteveCrawler')))]
